snippet.title: A Puzzle Game About Ducks 🦆 - Devlog 1
snippet.description:
In this video, I explore the core mechanics and decisions behind our upcoming game, "Ducks in a Row"!

Ducks in a Row on Steam 🦆: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2808260/Ducks_in_a_Row/

Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:21 - Looking for inspiration
1:17 - The core mechanics
1:43 - Design process
2:56 - Outro

Links:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GoofyGourds
Patreon -https://www.patreon.com/GoofyGourdStudios 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@goofygourds
Discord - https://discord.gg/A2xuuTEaUA

#indiedev #devlog #indiegame #godot
